text:

context_meta.author: Yahoo News
context_meta.title: US to pull out of UN agency over alleged anti-Israel bias
context_meta.summary: PARIS (AP) — The United States said Thursday it is pulling out of the U.N.'s educational, scientific and cultural agency because of what Washington sees as its anti-Israel bias and need for "fundamental reform."

text: Drop all these fiscally draining organizations...It's about time the people of the world take responsibility for their own culture, education and, scientific interests...With technology so advanced today, their is no need for someone else to continually fund the outside world for such folly into everyone's homeland.  International trade takes this another step for the free market to handle goods and services in these areas...Our national interests are past just commerce and have shifted more toward security issues via immigration and defense on the homefront.  It's time for all nations to grow up on their own, not rely on financial aid for their unbridled political aggression, rampant lack of family planning and reliance on U.S. taxpayers to bail them out, even for the wrath of Mother Nature.  UNESCO is no longer a necessary foothold for our participation to gain anything other than unappreciation for years of monetary assistance and, now nothing but criticism by participating nations bent on dissing Israel and inevitably plotting to annihilate the nation from existence.  Arabs & Islamists have blatantly stated and continually show this direction and have this as their mission statement to the world!
